group_1.textLeft: Mmh, haaa...
Geez, to think that I'd sleep in today of all days...

group_1.textRight: Were you up late last night...?

group_1.textLeft: Before I realized, it was already past midnight.
When I finally got back home, my mom was furious.
For real, it was totally the worst...

group_1.textRight: But your mom must have been really worried about you...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I get that it was my fault.
Oh...
If I remember correctly, isn't that girl over there a Magical Girl?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...@She was there with us the other day...

group_1.textLeft: Maybe we're heading towards the same place then.
Then you're not going, Kako?

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry for being so sudden...!
I really wanted to participate, but...

group_1.textLeft: If it's your team's policy then it can't be helped.
How can you be late on such an important day?

group_1.textRight: I told you, I had to make sure my hair looked good!
If that's not a critical situation for the beautiful @Ria Ami then what is!?

group_1.textLeft: Haa...@Nobody really cares about your hairstyle, senpai...

group_1.textRight: I thought for sure Masara wasn't going to @participate.

group_1.textLeft: I don't particularly care either way, but...

group_1.textCenter: Everyone's going to be meeting today.

group_1.textRight: Since from here on we're all comrades @cooperating with one another.

group_1.textCenter: Everyone who was fighting that Witch together is probably gonna be there!

group_1.textLeft: The girls of Mikazuki Villa and Kanagi contacted us.
I wonder if everyone's already gathered at the park?
Yachiyo!
I've finished drying the laundry so we can head out now!

group_1.textRight: This is all because Felicia left a tissue in her pocket.
We ended up losing a lot of time...

group_1.textLeft: The laundry was full of paper...

group_1.textRight: Sana and the rest went on ahead.@I wonder if they've already arrived by now.

group_1.textLeft: I just got in touch with her a bit ago.@It seems everyone's finished their errands.
Looks like everything's just about ready.

group_1.textRight: In that case, let's hurry on to the gathering place as well.

group_1.textLeft: You're right, all the Kamihama girls should be @gathering there now.
If we show up late, it'll mess up everything.

group_1.textRight: I'm going to check that the second floor is locked up.
Iroha, can you check the first floor?

group_1.textLeft: Got it!

group_1.narration: ―Iroha―@It feels like so much time has passed.
―Iroha―@Coming to Kamihama in search of Ui.
―Iroha―@Fighting with the Wings of the Magius.
―Yachiyo―@After that, everyone was in a panic@as the knowledge of becoming Witches became widespread,@but at last, things have started to settle down.
―Iroha―@It all still feels so unreal to me@that I can't help but feel like I'm dreaming.
―Iroha―@It feels like so long ago@when Yachiyo first tried to drive me away@as I was searching for Ui,@like a distant memory.
―Yachiyo―@That story about me...@well, it's fine now I suppose.
―Yachiyo―@Right now, we're all living together happily.@Everyone in Kamihama is trying to come together as well.
